onboarding.title: Registration
onboarding.welcome_collect_name:
👋 Hi! I'm Armelle, your tax assistant for Cameroon.

I can help you calculate your IGS, file tax returns, track deadlines and answer general tax questions!

To start, enter your Name/Company name.
Example: MBARGA FOUDA / ABC EXPRESS
